org.primaresearch.clc.phd.ontology.label

Interface HasLabels

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Activity, DataCollection, DataObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomicActivity, BaseActivity, BaseDataObject, DataCollectionImpl, DirectedGraphActivity, ForLoopActivity, SingleDataObject

    public interface HasLabels
    Interface for objects that can have labels
    Author:
    clc

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Label addLabel(LabelType labelType)
      Creates and adds a label of the given type
      java.util.Collection<LabelGroup> getLabels()
      Returns a collection of all labels (arranged in label groups)
      boolean hasLabels()
      Checks if the labellable object has at least one label
      void removeLabel(Label label)
      Removes the specified label

    • Method Detail

      • getLabels

        java.util.Collection<LabelGroup> getLabels()
        Returns a collection of all labels (arranged in label groups)

      • addLabel

        Label addLabel(LabelType labelType)
        throws LabelGroup.TooManyLabelsInGroupException
        Creates and adds a label of the given type
        Parameters:
        labelType - Type of the new label
        Returns:
        The new label
        Throws:
        LabelGroup.TooManyLabelsInGroupException - The corresponding label group is full (maximum number of labels)

      • removeLabel

        void removeLabel(Label label)
        Removes the specified label

      • hasLabels

        Checks if the labellable object has at least one label
